text: Dancer, Texas Pop. 81 is a 1998 American comedy-drama movie directed by first time director Tim McCanlies. It stars Breckin Meyer, Peter Facinelli, Eddie Mills, Ethan Embry, Ashley Johnson, Patricia Wettig, Michael O'Neill, Eddie Jones, Wayne Tippit and Alexandra Holden. It was distributed by Tri-Star Pictures. ==Other websites== * * * * Category:1998 comedy-drama movies Category:1998 independent movies Category:American comedy-drama movies Category:American independent movies Category:Movies set in Texas Category:Movies directed by Tim McCanlies
title: Dancer, Texas Pop. 81
